name: CutShot
description:
GAIN AS MANY FOLLOWERS AS YOU CAN!

Developed for SEA Game Jam 2019 in Malaysia with a team of 5, this mobile game captures the frantic scramble for social acceptance in the modern world. Post an endless stream of content to garner followers! 

BUT BEWARE!

As you gain followers, messages will pop up! Tap on them to reply with equally empty and meaningless responses to show that you DO care about them. But if you can't reply fast enough, they'll turn red and you'll start losing followers!

And as you progress...

Scam messages will start appearing to! Tap on them and you'll lose the game.  Not only that, your phone will start to run out of battery! Shake the phone to charge it!

So, how far up the social ladder can you climb?

CREDITS:

Cheong Yi Siang - Programmer

Muhammad Ardhan - Programmer

Chew Tong Sim - Artist

Chiang Jing An - Designer

Kugenkeith (Ace) - Sound Designer
